des.title: Awarded First Place in Hackathon
des: Secured 1st place in a 2-hour province-level coding and animation hackathon organized by Digischool and Cannon Secondary School in Lumbini Province, competing solo in Category 3 (Classes 6â€“7).
Represented Nawajyoti English Boarding School as the only participant from the school and defeated opponents by over 300 points, showcasing exceptional problem-solving speed and accuracy.

Developed a Python-based scientific calculator featuring both basic operations and advanced vector and matrix calculations using NumPy, demonstrating strong programming skills and efficient algorithm design under time constraints.
